project.name: C-C839A-GREP-01-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C839A-GREP-01-ST01-DT02-DF11-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: all words beginning with e or x, case sensitive Read an integer from the input. If integer >= 4096, do nothing.Else malloc a buffer of 4096 bytes. Memset the buffer to 'a'. Memset bytes of buffer from input_integer to 4095 to 'b'. Print the buffer. This all works correctly if the input_integer is 0 or greater. If input_integer is negative, we will try to memset a random place in memory. If the input_integer is sufficiently large, this is unaddressable, and we get a segfault.

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
